website_summaries.verdict: This low-cut hiking shoe from Merrell features an assortment of positive qualities, mainly led by its comfortable feel and protection against wet trail conditions. The footgear’s traction and snug fit also registered positive remarks. On the flipside, the hiker’s removable footbed disappointed by not delivering enough arch support. Taking everything into account, the Merrell Capra GTX is a shoe that can provide sufficient performance on the trail.
pros: An overwhelming percentage of users said that the Merrell Capra GTX was comfortable to wear
The shoe’s Gore-Tex liner was effective in keeping water out, as mentioned by the majority
A handful of owners approved of its overall snug fit
According to several consumers, this Merrell product gripped well on wet and muddy surfaces
A few hikers acknowledged the footwear’s ability to keep the foot warm in cold conditions
The lightness of this hiking shoe impressed a couple of patrons
cons: The minority felt the Merrell Capra GTX’s removable footbed didn’t provide sufficient arch support

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, a tad large (bearing in mind that I'm 11 I ordered 12 (given the warning by reviews that Merrell tend to run small), I think perfect fit would be 11 and 1/2 but was not available) but fit OK nevertheless, very confortable. I walk a lot during the day at work and these don't give me any aches on my feet after wearing them all day. If you have the chance and find the 1/2 size bigger than your usual size in other shoes consider it, but 1 full size on these fits still OK.
customer_reviews.author: A. Giraldo

customer_reviews.title: different measures
customer_reviews.text: UK 41 is not equal to european 41! I tried the shoes with size 41 in Decathlon in Poland and they fit perfectly. I received size 41 from UK and it was way too small! I checked it couple of times in Amazon's size conversion table, to no avail!
customer_reviews.author: Olo

customer_reviews.title: So far, very good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my reliable old Chameleons, which after nearly 7 years of excellent surface wore out on the soles. These are comfortable (I didn't need a bigger size), look well made, and maybe they'll last as long. If they last only half as long as the last pair they'll deserve the full 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dun Ravin'

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable and good value at £65
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and good value at £65, (went up to £82 the next day!) There are many reviews for sizes of Merrell being too small, I normally need size around 11.5 but these are 12.5 and fit well, 12 was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: if buying these shoes you need to go up at least a half size
customer_reviews.text: I started with a size UK 7.5, which is a half size up from normal business/dress shoes, they were still too tight, so I moved up to a UK 8, these are a perfect fit and the shoes are great. I also bought Merrell shoes for Christmas for my B-in-L, he is normally UK 10, so I bought him UK 10.5 and they fitted fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bill-T

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoes and super comfy which is to be expected from Merrell! As has been stated before, size up a half if you can to get the perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Klis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I wear an 8.5 and these are perfect at that size. Walking the dog in early morning frost and dew, my feet stay dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Africanimpi

customer_reviews.title: Order 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes up to the usual high Merrell standard. Having ordered one size larger, as per 3 previous pairs of Merrells, these came slightly large. Product recommended but order a 1/2 size larger than your normal uk size.
customer_reviews.author: Sirgaften

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Add a half size to ordinary fit. Really comfy shoes with Vibram sole
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable right from the first time you put them on
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair I have brought, very comfortable right from the first time you put them on.
customer_reviews.author: mr s e radford

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Capra GTX Low Rise Hiking Shoes
product_meta.description: These Capra Gore-Tex shoes from Merrell feature traditional lace closing and mesh lining. These shoes also feature trail protect pad which offers additional protection off road along with moulded nylon arch shank. Merrell air cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability.
feature_bullets: Synthetic leather and mesh upper - A secure structure that engages a waterproof coating and mesh materials for a breathable and durable exterior.
GORE-TEX waterproof membrane - Keeps water out whilst allowing moisture to escape.
Traditional lace closure - Secures the foot in place.
Breathable mesh lining - Allows air to permeate the interior.
